"シャンプラン": "Whew, you're a force of nature, ain't you? Takin' care of the biggest ass-pains out there like it was nothin'."
"I gotta say, I really don't see what you get outta helping me out like this."
"Just outta the kindness of your heart? Man, I don't get Meteorn at all."
"Honestly, I've never really been one to trust your lot."
"You fall out of the sky just like DOLLS do, and you're just as full of mysteries as they are."
"Really, I used to think you Meteorn might secretly be in cahoots with the DOLLS or something."
"But... I'm starting to think it might be alright to trust you a little bit..."
"Yeah nah, I don't get this at all."
"Sorry, forget what I just said."
"Until now, I've never had a good impression of Meteorn."
"Talking with you, though... It's starting to mess with my head."
"Listen, sorry about before, sayin' weird stuff like that."
"So hey, uh..."
"I'm kind of in a bind again. I need to collect some data for food ingredients."
"I need you to get me some Sharp Kvar Squid. I wanna get some data on it."
"They look similar to their nighttime counterparts, so make sure you don't get the wrong kind."
"Yeah, I get it. You're busy too. It's cool, I can handle this myself."
"Thanks again, you're a big help. Now lemme just scan this real quick..."
"So hey, I've had some more opportunities to talk to other Meteorn out here."
"They're always helping out with a bunch of stuff."
"...You Meteorn have always been like that."
"Stuff that us Halpha-born folks struggle with, you folks make it all look as easy as breathing."
"Give even the most clumsy and helpless Meteorn a weapon, and after a week they'll outperform our most hardened combat veterans."
"I've always seen you Meteorn as different from us. I thought there's no way you guys could be the same as us."
"But... After talking to more and more of you, I've started to realize that we ain't all that different."
"Some Meteorn just seem TOO perfect though, and yeah, those guys still weird me out."
"...Oh, scan's complete. Here's your stuff back."
"...Thanks, yeah? I appreciate it."
"Yeah, what's up?"
"...Wait, you don't still wanna take over one of my missions for me, do you?"
"I mean, there's really not much left that I can't..."
"Ah... no, wait, there is one nasty one left over."
"I think this is definitely somethin' only you can handle."
"If you're going to get that Notable Kvaris Meat, you'd best not forget your cold weather protection."
"Rayjord Gorge doesn't mess around, I'm tellin' you."
"Well, I ain't gonna force you. I'll figure something out on my own."
"Thanks again. I'll be honest, I was actually a little worried for you this time."
"Alright, lemme scan this stuff real quick."
"But yeah... I'm pretty relieved to see you return."
"I know I asked you to help, but don't try to do the impossible, alright?"
"Hahahah! Who woulda thought I'd ever end up saying that to a Meteorn."
"You know, looking at you helpin' folks out like this makes me think like, yeah, if someone needs help, why not help 'em?"
"Doesn't matter if you're Meteorn or not."
"So hey, if YOU ever find yourself in a bind, you let me know, alright!"
"...Oh, scan's complete. Here's your stuff back."
"I'll see you around. Just remember me when you become famous!"
"If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to let me know."
"We're in this together, after all."
